title: Witch's Hut
mainText: {kw:Effect} — When you draw bid cards, you may draw up to three extra. At the end of the bid, you must trash one additional card at random for every extra card drawn this way.
flavourText: The local coven of witches is always there to help you achieve your goals. The question is: what do they ask in return? Some say, it’s a blood price... - Karina, the Bewitching Witch
